Compile time verification and generation of documentation from Swift Playgrounds

Learn more

Verification

Eases the creation of Swift Playgrounds with support for third party libraries.

Compile

Compiles Swift Playgrounds with support for third party libraries from the command line.

Generation

Generates Markdown project from Swift Playground.

Integration

Integrates Swift Playgrounds with Jekyll to create a microsite.

Nef is designed and developed by nef with support from 47 Degrees
